OrgName: Sheppard Mullin Richter & Hampton, LLP & US Affiliates
activities: Sheppard Mullin is an international law firm with clients located throughout the world, including in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  In the course of its operations and through its representation of clients, Sheppard Mullin at times comes into custody of certain personal information received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.
